scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build:all
scripts.reset: npm run clean:install && npm run lint
